Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.common.actions

Class PlaceCardAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.common.actions.GameAction
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.common.actions.PlaceCardAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlaceCardAction extends GameAction
Represents an action to place a card on the game board.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PlaceCardAction

      public PlaceCardAction(String username, int cardId, int parentRow, int parentCol, CornerPosition cornerPosition, boolean flipped)
      Constructs a new PlaceCardAction.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player performing the action
      cardId - the ID of the card being placed
      parentRow - the row of the parent card
      parentCol - the column of the parent card
      cornerPosition - the corner position where the card is placed relative to the parent card
      flipped - indicates if the card is placed flipped
